name: files.sharedPublicURL
desc: Enables a file for public/external sharing.

errors.not_allowed: Public sharing has been disabled for this team. You may see this error if you are creating an external link from a free or trial workspace. You can either upgrade to a [Paid Plan](https://app.slack.com/plans) or use `file.list` to get a `url_private_download` link, download the file with an application, and re-upload it somewhere it can be shared with users who are not members of your workspace. Be sure to pass the Slack [Bot token](/authentication/tokens#bot) to the request on the headers file when calling `url_private_download`.
errors.public_video_not_allowed: Public sharing of videos is not available. A `Free` instance of Slack may encounter this error because free teams don't have the ability to share video files publicly.
errors.public_file_type_not_allowed: Public sharing has been restricted for this file type.
